Ocean Life.name: Fin-tastic Fish Facts
Ocean Life.description: Dive into the world of ichthyology with this quiz! Test your knowledge of fish, tides, and the ocean's bounty. From identifying different species to understanding marine terminology, this quiz will challenge your understanding of the underwater realm.

questions.text: What is the technical term for someone who studies fish?
What term is used to describe a group of fish?
On average, what length of time passes between high tides?
Which of these foods could you catch at sea?
Which of these is a fish?

Ocean Life.description: Explore the impact of environmental disasters and test your knowledge of marine life. This quiz combines questions about fish identification with a look at a significant ecological event. Can you navigate the waters of knowledge?
